game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to quest giver.
game.description: You've heard rumors that the lost artifact is hidden deep in the forest. Locate it and bring it back to quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a rare enchanted weapon

task.description: Navigate through the Forest of Shadows to find the artifact. Beware of the creatures that lurk in the shadows.
